# Repository contributions

## Contributions policy
We are currently not accepting public contributions (but we do plan to in later releases and weâ€™ll keep you posted on this). However, we are taking issues and we do want your [feedback](https://github.com/spatialos/gdk-for-unity#give-us-feedback).

## Coding standards
See the [GDK for Unity C# coding standards guide](https://github.com/spatialos/gdk-for-unity/blob/master/coding-standards.md).

## Getting started
See the [Get Started guide](https://docs.improbable.io/unity/alpha/get-started) for details on how to use the SpatialOS GDK for Unity.
